Blockquote
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion sections are commonly used around the web. If you are constrained by the space accordion is a great solution, as you can see in some portfolio items we have used them to make the look of the page more appealing. Accordions are mostly used for FAQ sections. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Full Width Blockquote"][vc_column_text] I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Attributes:
  • title- set widgets title.
  • active tab - specifies open tab (optionally all tabs can be closed).
  • allow collapsible all- specifies if collapsing all tabs is possible.
  • extra class name - add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Item Attributes:
  • title - specifies accordion title.
  • content- inside the accordion can be added any other shortcode.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Features Backup
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row bg_color="#222222" font_color="#ffffff" padding="5em" margin_bottom="5em" bg_image="2170" overlay_color="#000000" overlay_color_opacity="70" overlay_pattern="1253" overlay_pattern_opacity="30" full_width="1"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

MEET BLASZOK

TRULY ALL-IN-ONE THEME

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]THE STORY BEHIND BLASZOK

Hello, thanks for taking the time to check out Blaszok. My name is Kuba and I am a web designer & developer form Poland with a small team of talented web geeks. You may know me from my Flash & jQuery Flip Books which were the best selling items around here (before the WordPress boom), and also from WordPress themes likeAgeraorGentle.

Making a truly all-in-one easy to use theme is a goal that has been in my mind for a long time. I have been planning this project for months but the final development took usmore then 3 months of work(sometimes more then 12 hours a day). I am really proud of the final result. We were able to make abeautiful, easy to use & fully customizable theme.As you can see by the previews (home design styles & examples)this theme may be used for almost any website. I hope that you will find as much fun using Blaszok as we had making it. We are fully dedicated to this project and we would love to develop it further but for thatwe need your support.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][mpc_vc_icon_column icon="fa-thumbs-up" color="#b363a0" title="Early bird promotion" text="Purchase Blaszok now and we will install it for you and setup (like the preview) for free! To use the promotion please purchase the theme, and file a support ticket at mpc.ticksy.com with your WordPress login information."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="1" parallax="1" font_color="#ffffff"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

RESPONSIVE & RETINA READY

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="5em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image image="2194" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

OVERVIEW

Blaszok is fully responsive & retina ready. Tested on real devices iOS, Android & Windows based. We have made every effort for the Blaszok to look as good (or even better) on mobile devices then it does on desktop. It was designed from the ground up as a responsive theme. We are using font icons to make it look good on any resolution. You have 360+ icons available out of the box, fully responsive & retina ready. For the logo you can specify two sources one for the standard resolution and one for the retina.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_color="#ffffff" padding="5em" margin_bottom="5em" bg_image="972" bg_image_repeat="cover" overlay_color="#000000" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern="1253" overlay_pattern_opacity="50" full_width="1" parallax="1" font_color="#ffffff"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

SUPER DEAL

Easy to use & customize with tones of features. Choose from 40+ content elements. Supportsover 50,000 websites!See it in action.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]SLIDER REVOLUTION One of the most advanced & powerful sliders on the market. Easy to use with drag & drop slide builder. Frequently updated with new features and improvements. Used by more then 30,000 websites.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]SHORTCODES PACKAGE The shortcodes package extends the functionalities of Visual Composer. Adds 14 new content elements to the Visual Composer like: recent portfolio, posts & products sliders (compatible with WooCommerce).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]CUSTOM WIDGETS Widgets packages comes with few additional add-ons extending the functionality of WordPress like: Twitter feed, Smart Search & Shop Info.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_color="#ffffff" padding="5em" margin_bottom="5em" bg_image="1478" bg_image_repeat="cover" overlay_color="#ffffff" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern="1253" overlay_pattern_opacity="30" full_width="1" parallax="1" font_color="#444444"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

WOOCOMMERCE

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

With Blaszok you can start selling today. This theme supports all of the WooCommerce native features and adds few of their own. With the WordPress admin panel managing your shop never been this easy!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Front Page
item.content:encoded:
Use this static Page to test the Theme's handling of the Front Page template file.
This is the Front Page content. Use this static Page to test the Front Page output of the Theme. The Theme should properly handle both Blog Posts Index as Front Page and static Page as Front Page.
If the site is set to display the Blog Posts Index as the Front Page, then this text should not be visible. If the site is set to display a static Page as the Front Page, then this text may or may not be visible. If the Theme does not include a front-page.php template file, then this text should appear on the Front Page when set to display a static Page. If the Theme does include a front-page.php template file, then this text may or may not appear.

item.title: Blog
item.content:encoded: Use this static Page to test the Theme's handling of the Blog Posts Index page. If the site is set to display a static Page on the Front Page, and this Page is set to display the Blog Posts Index, then this text should not appear.

[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion sections are commonly used around the web. If you are constrained by the space accordion is a great solution, as you can see in some portfolio items we have used them to make the look of the page more appealing. Accordions are mostly used for FAQ sections. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="First Accordion Opened by Default"][vc_accordion active_tab="1"][vc_accordion_tab title="Accordion Title 1"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc dignissim varius ante, eget pellentesque felis congue ac. Donec placerat adipiscing sapien id consequat. Donec nec auctor nisl. Curabitur hendrerit ultricies ligula ac blandit. Praesent non vulputate turpis. In est nibh, fermentum eget malesuada ut, ultrices ac lacus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Attributes:
  • title- set widgets title.
  • active tab - specifies open tab (optionally all tabs can be closed).
  • allow collapsible all- specifies if collapsing all tabs is possible.
  • extra class name - add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Item Attributes:
  • title - specifies accordion title.
  • content- inside the accordion can be added any other shortcode.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Audio
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Audio shortcode may be used to embed any audio file from any website, below are just few examples. To embed the audio into Blaszok first get the embed code from any website. Open up Visual Composer and choose the Raw HTML element, paste the code inside and thats it! With the Raw HTML extension you can embed any code easily inside your page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="SoundCloud Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="GrooveShark Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="MySpace Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Deezer Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • content- specifies source of the audio snippet (embed code).
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Blockquote / Quote
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Quote like the name suggests are perfect for quoting text, they can be easily used through out the template. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Full Width Quote"][mpc_vc_quote quote="Your time is limited, so dont waste it living someone elses life. Dont be trapped by dogma which is living with the results of other peoples thinking. Dont let the noise of others opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary." author="- Steve Jobs"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Column Quote"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_quote quote="Stay hungry stay foolish." author=" - Steve Jobs"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_quote quote="The mind is everything. What you think you become." author="- Buddha"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_quote quote="First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win." author="- Mahatma Gandhi"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • content- set the content.
  • author - set the author of the quote.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Buttons
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion sections are commonly used around the web. If you are constrained by the space accordion is a great solution, as you can see in some portfolio items we have used them to make the look of the page more appealing. Accordions are mostly used for FAQ sections. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_button title="Text on the button" target="_self" color="wpb_button" icon="none" size="wpb_regularsize"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Attributes:
  • title- set widgets title.
  • active tab - specifies open tab (optionally all tabs can be closed).
  • allow collapsible all- specifies if collapsing all tabs is possible.
  • extra class name - add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Item Attributes:
  • title - specifies accordion title.
  • content- inside the accordion can be added any other shortcode.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: mpcreation

item.title: Decor Headings
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Beyond the standard headings Blaszok comes with decor headings shrotcode which allows you to simple add uppercase headings with a decor line. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h1" text="Decor Heading H1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h2" text="Decor Heading H2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h3" text="Decor Heading H3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h4" text="Decor Heading H4"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Decor Heading H5"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h6" text="Decor Heading H6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • type- size of the heading.
  • text - content for the heading.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Dividers
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Dividers maybe used to easily divide partsof the content. There are two types of dividers available: standard dividers and dividers with a label. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_separator color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_text_separator title="Divider Message" title_align="separator_align_left" color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_text_separator title="Divider Message" title_align="separator_align_center" color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_text_separator title="Divider Message" title_align="separator_align_right" color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • title- divider text.
  • aligment - text aligment.
  • extra class name - add special class for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

In eget nisl in justo mattis accumsan eu nec magna. Pellentesque pellentesque pharetra lacus, eget aliquet mi mattis eu. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Large Dropcaps"][vc_column_text][mpc_sh_dropcaps background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" size="large"]P[/mpc_sh_dropcaps]hasellus iaculis posuere velit, congue placerat dui rhoncus vel. Maecenas tortor orci, aliquet et fringilla a, tristique vitae metus. Nunc dignissim varius ante, eget pellentesque felis congue ac.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Normal Dropcaps"][vc_column_text][mpc_sh_dropcaps background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" size="normal"]E[/mpc_sh_dropcaps]tiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in, consectetur sed enim. Vestibulum aliquet justo rutrum magna tincidunt.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Small Dropcaps"][vc_column_text][mpc_sh_dropcaps background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" size="small"]N[/mpc_sh_dropcaps]ullam eleifend nisl facilisis turpis luctus a bibendum nisl vulputate. Cras feugiat leo a nulla aliquet vitae auctor odio egestas. Phasellus iaculis posuere velit.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • letter- content of the dropcaps.
  • size - size of the dropcaps: small, normal, large, huge.
  • background color - dropcaps background color.
  • letter color -dropcaps text color.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Share
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]There are two type of shares available in Blaszok. First one is based on font awesome icons and there are over 30 social networks available to share on. The second one is a standard social share build into Blaszok for the most popular social services like: Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and Google+. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Standard Share"][mpc_vc_share_list title="Share:" facebook="1" twitter="1" item.title: Highlight
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Highlight shortcode may be used to feature part of the text, sometimes bold or italic just isn't enough. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposertext editor as an inline shortcode.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Inline Text Hightlight"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in. Vestibulum aliquet[mpc_sh_highlight background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff"]lorem ipsum dolar sit amen aler tos dance[/mpc_sh_highlight]justo rutrum magna tincidunt fringilla. In eget nisl in justo mattis accumsan eu nec magna. Pellentesque pellentesque eu. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis [mpc_sh_highlight background="#444444" color="#ffffff"] pharetra lacus, eget aliquet mi mattis[/mpc_sh_highlight]parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • text- specify text to be highlighted.
  • background color - highlight background color.
  • text color - color of the highlighted text.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Icon Lists
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Icon Lists support over 360 icons to choose from, in a single list you can have different icons and different colors of the icons. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available throughVisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][mpc_vc_icon_list icon_color="#666666" text_color="#666666" item.title: Image
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion sections are commonly used around the web. If you are constrained by the space accordion is a great solution, as you can see in some portfolio items we have used them to make the look of the page more appealing. Accordions are mostly used for FAQ sections. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Large Image"][vc_single_image image="607" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Image Align Left"][vc_single_image image="603" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Image Align Center"][vc_single_image image="602" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Image Align Right"][vc_single_image image="608" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set image title.
  • image - specify image from media library.
  • CSS Animation- choose one of 6 preset CSS animations.
  • image size- specify image size (or responsive).
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • image aligment- specify image aligment.
  • link to large image- yes/no.
  • extra class name- add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Map
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Map shortcode let's you add a google map embed, there is tone of options inside to choose from: zoom strength, size, map type and much more. item.content:encoded:

Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Skills Flat"][vc_progress_bar values="90|Development" bgcolor="bar_blue" options="animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="80|Design" bgcolor="bar_turquoise" options="animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="70|Marketing" bgcolor="bar_green" options="animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="95|Typography" bgcolor="custom" options="animated" units="%" custombgcolor="#b363a0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Skill With Stripes"][vc_progress_bar values="95|Typography" bgcolor="custom" options="striped,animated" units="%" custombgcolor="#8e314a"][vc_progress_bar values="70|Marketing" bgcolor="bar_red" options="striped,animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="80|Design" bgcolor="bar_black" options="striped,animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="90|Development" bgcolor="bar_orange" options="striped,animated" units="%"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

  • extra class- you can add extra class to be used inside CSS
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Image Carousel
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Image carousels can be used as image sliders or banner rotators. This shortcode has many options (see the list of attributes at the bottom) and is very easy to use. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Standard Image Carousel"][vc_images_carousel images="422,602,607,608,603" onclick="link_no" custom_links_target="_self" mode="horizontal" speed="5000" slides_per_view="1" wrap="yes" img_size="860x567"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Slide Show Image Carousel Without Any Controls"][vc_images_carousel images="607,422,602,608,603" onclick="link_no" custom_links_target="_self" mode="horizontal" speed="3000" slides_per_view="1" wrap="yes" img_size="860x567" autoplay="yes" hide_pagination_control="yes" hide_prev_next_buttons="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • images- specifies images.
  • image size- specifies image size.
  • on click - add lightbox, open url or do nothing.
  • slider mode - horizontal or vertical.
  • slider speed -speed of slide show in miliseconds.
  • images per view- how many images to display per view.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • slider auto play- yes/no.
  • hide pagination controls - yes/no.
  • hide buttons- yes/no.
  • partial view - if yes part of the next slide will be visible on the right side.
  • slider loop- yes/no.
  • extra class- to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Content Teaser Carousel
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Content Teaser Carousel maybe used on home section to show the latest items from the blog, portfolio or shop. The settings for this shortcode are almost end less. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Standard Post Carousel"][vc_carousel posts_query="size:6|order_by:date|post_type:post" layout="image|link_post,title|link_post,text|excerpt,link" link_target="_self" speed="0" mode="horizontal" slides_per_view="2" autoplay="yes" thumb_size="full" hide_pagination_control="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Portfolio Carousel With Slide Show"][vc_carousel posts_query="size:8|order_by:date|post_type:mpc_portfolio|tax_query:186" layout="image|link_post,title|link_post" link_target="_self" speed="3000" mode="horizontal" slides_per_view="3" autoplay="yes" thumb_size="mpcth-horizontal-columns-3" hide_pagination_control="yes" wrap="yes" el_class="mpcth-vertical-columns-3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Product Carousel "][vc_carousel posts_query="size:12|order_by:date|post_type:product" layout="image|link_post,title|link_post" link_target="_self" speed="0" mode="horizontal" slides_per_view="3" autoplay="yes" thumb_size="mpcth-vertical-columns-3" hide_pagination_control="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • carousel content - here you can specify the content of the carousel you can choose: posts, product from the shop portfolio items, pages or mix of any of previously mentioned.
  • post count - how many posts to display.
  • order -how to sort the posts.
  • categories - filter by categories.
  • tags -filter by tags.
  • taxonomies - filter by taxonomy.
  • author - filter by author.
  • teaser layout - specify in which order to display the teaser (thumbnail, title or excerpt).
  • link target- same window / blank.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • thumbnail size -specify the size of the thumbnail.
  • on click- add lightbox, open url or do nothing.
  • carousel mode- horizontal or vertical.
  • carousel speed -speed of slide show in miliseconds.
  • items per view- how many images to display per view.
  • slider auto play- yes/no.
  • hide pagination controls - yes/no.
  • hide buttons- yes/no.
  • slider loop- yes/no.
  • extra class- to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Content Grid
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Content Grid maybe used on home section to show the latest items from the blog, portfolio or shop. The settings for this shortcode are almost end less. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available throughVisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Post Grid"][vc_posts_grid loop="size:4|order_by:date|order:DESC|post_type:post" grid_columns_count="2" grid_layout="title|link_post,image|link_post,text|excerpt" grid_link_target="_self" grid_layout_mode="masonry" grid_thumb_size="full"][/vc_posts_grid][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Portfolio Grid"][vc_posts_grid loop="size:3|order_by:date|post_type:mpc_portfolio" grid_columns_count="3" grid_layout="image|link_post,text|excerpt" grid_link_target="_self" grid_layout_mode="fitRows" grid_thumb_size="mpcth-horizontal-columns-3"][/vc_posts_grid][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Product Grid"][vc_posts_grid loop="size:4|order_by:date|post_type:product" grid_columns_count="4" grid_layout="image|link_post,title|link_post,text|excerpt" grid_link_target="_self" grid_layout_mode="fitRows" grid_thumb_size="full"][/vc_posts_grid][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • grid content- here you can specify the content of the grid you can choose: posts, product from the shop portfolio items, pages or mix of any of previously mentioned.
  • post count- how many posts to display.
  • order -how to sort the posts.
  • categories- filter by categories.
  • tags -filter by tags.
  • taxonomies- filter by taxonomy.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • author- filter by author.
  • teaser layout- specify in which order to display the teaser (thumbnail, title or excerpt).
  • link target- same window / blank.
  • thumbnail size -specify the size of the thumbnail.
  • items per view- how many images to display per view.
  • extra class- to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Content Slider
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Content slider maybe use to showcase recent/featured content. You can choose any post type you like, also narrow it by category ids etc. You can also choose between 3 effects: flex slider fade, flex slider slide and nivo slider. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Posts Slider With Slide Show"][vc_posts_slider type="flexslider_slide" interval="3" link="link_post" order="DESC" count="5" posttypes="post" thumb_size="full" slides_content="teaser" slides_title="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Portfolio Slider With Nivo Slider"][vc_posts_slider type="nivo" interval="0" link="link_post" order="DESC" count="6" posttypes="mpc_portfolio" thumb_size="full" slides_title="1" categories="photography"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Product Slider With Fade Effect"][vc_posts_slider type="flexslider_fade" interval="0" link="link_post" order="DESC" count="5" posttypes="product" thumb_size="full" slides_content="teaser" slides_title="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • slide type - specifies slider type: flex with slide effect, flex with fade effect or nivo slider.
  • slides count- number of slides.
  • auto rotate slides - how often to rotate slides.
  • post type - post, product, portfolio or page.
  • description- yes/no.
  • title - yes/no.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • link -few settings where to link.
  • thumbnail size- set thumbnail size.
  • post/page ids- filter by ids.
  • categories- filter by category.
  • order by- specify posts order.
  • extra class name- specify extra class name to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Widgets
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]With Blaszok you can add any standard wordpress widget inside your page. There are more then 12 widgets available by default with more to come. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_wp_posts show_date="1" number="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h6" text="Calendar Widget"][vc_wp_calendar][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h6" text="Available Widgets"][vc_column_text]
  • WP Search
  • WP Meta
  • WP Recent Comments
  • WP Calendar
  • WP Pages
  • WP Tag Cloud
  • WP Custom Menu
  • WP Text
  • WP Recent Posts
  • WP Links
  • WP Categories
  • WP Archvive
  • WP RSS
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Attributes depends from the widgets.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Message Boxes / Alerts
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Notices maybe used to show important information to users about updates or changes on the website. There are 4 pre-styled box types. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Standard Notice Boxes"][vc_message color="alert-info"]This is a standard Informational message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][vc_message color="alert-block"]This is a standard Warning message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][vc_message color="alert-success"]This is a standard Success message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][vc_message color="alert-error"]This is a standard Error message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • message type- choose from 4 pre-styled types.
  • content - content of the notice box.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Charts
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Charts maybe used to represent the progress or maybe a skill learning curve. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Pie Charts"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="100" label_value="100" color="btn-primary" units="%" title="Creativity"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="80" label_value="80" color="btn-success" units="%" title="Flow"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="90" label_value="90" color="btn-info" units="%" title="Design"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="75" label_value="75" color="btn-warning" units="%" title="Marketing"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • value - you can choose from 0-100.
  • label- specifies label for the chart.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • units- specify units for the value.
  • color -choose chart color.
  • extra class name- specify unique class to be used inside CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Buttons
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Buttons are one of the most used sortcodes on the web thats why we have prepared for you many customization to style and change the look of your buttons. You can set any color and on of the 369 icons additionally you can place the icon in one of 4 positions. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Button With Icon"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_button title="Button Text" target="_self" custom_color="#B163A3" custom_icon="fa-angle-right" custom_pos="right"][vc_button title="Button Text" target="_self" custom_color="#666666" custom_icon="fa-bullseye" custom_pos="right"][vc_button title="Button Text" target="_self" custom_color="#009c75" custom_icon="fa-cloud" custom_pos="right"][vc_button title="Button Text" target="_self" custom_color="#0093c7" item.title: Call Out Box
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Call out box are mostly use to draw people attention, for example this element can be used for a newsletter signup, promotion announcement or any other call to action. You can set any color to the button, choose one of 369 icons and one of 3 positions for the button. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Box - Button Right"][vc_cta_button call_text="free shipping for orders over $49" title="Delivered to your doors in 2 days" target="_self" position="cta_align_right" custom_color="#B163A3" custom_icon="_none" custom_pos="top" href="#"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Box - Button Left"][vc_cta_button call_text="100% Satisfaction Guarantee" title="Button Text" target="_self" position="cta_align_left" custom_color="#009c75" custom_icon="fa-cloud" custom_pos="left" href="#"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Box - Button Bottom"][vc_cta_button call_text="100% Satisfaction Guarantee" title="60 Day Refound Policy Click To Learn More" target="_self" position="cta_align_bottom" custom_color="#0093c7" custom_icon="fa-check" custom_pos="left" href="#"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • text- call out message.
  • button text - button text.
  • url- specifie link (url).
  • button position - choose button position.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • button color -set button color.
  • icon type -choose one of 369 icons.
  • icon position- choose icon position: top, left, right or bottom.
  • extra class name- add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Flex slide is one of the most popular sliders out there it is fully responsive and has many options. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Our Partners"][mpc_vc_images_slider images="1184,1185,1183,1188,1187,1458,1451,1450,1455,1454,1258,1453" links="#,#,#,#,#" brands="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Partners Alternative"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]Check Out Our Brands Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in.Pellentesque pellentesque pharetra lacus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][mpc_vc_images_slider images="1187,1183,1188,1458,1185,1451,1450,1455,1184,1453,1258,1454" links="#,#,#,#,#" brands="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • images- specifies images.
  • image size- specifies image size.
  • on click- add lightbox, open url or do nothing.
  • slider mode- horizontal or vertical.
  • slider speed -speed of slide show in miliseconds.
  • images per view- how many images to display per view.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • slider auto play- yes/no.
  • hide pagination controls - yes/no.
  • hide buttons- yes/no.
  • partial view - if yes part of the next slide will be visible on the right side.
  • slider loop- yes/no.
  • extra class- to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Revolution Slider
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]With Blaszok you get this stunning slider for free (worth $19). Revolution slider is one of the most advanced sliders out there. It comes with it's own easy to use admin panel, with this slider you can easily create any slide you want. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Revolution Slider"][rev_slider_vc alias="small2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Revolution slider comes with it's own easy to use administration panel with tones of options. item.title: test
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Content Grid maybe used on home section to show the latest items from the blog, portfolio or shop. The settings for this shortcode are almost end less. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available throughVisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Post Grid"][vc_posts_grid loop="size:1|order_by:date|order:DESC|post_type:post,mpc_portfolio" grid_columns_count="1" grid_layout="title,image,text" grid_link_target="_self" grid_layout_mode="fitRows" grid_thumb_size="thumbnail"][/vc_posts_grid][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Portfolio Grid"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • grid content- here you can specify the content of the grid you can choose: posts, product from the shop portfolio items, pages or mix of any of previously mentioned.
  • post count- how many posts to display.
  • order -how to sort the posts.
  • categories- filter by categories.
  • tags -filter by tags.
  • taxonomies- filter by taxonomy.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • author- filter by author.
  • teaser layout- specify in which order to display the teaser (thumbnail, title or excerpt).
  • link target- same window / blank.
  • thumbnail size -specify the size of the thumbnail.
  • items per view- how many images to display per view.
  • extra class- to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Features
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row bg_color="#222222" font_color="#ffffff" padding="5em" margin_bottom="5em" bg_image="2341" overlay_color="#000000" overlay_color_opacity="70" overlay_pattern="1253" overlay_pattern_opacity="30" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_meet_blaszok"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

MEET BLASZOK

TRULY ALL-IN-ONE THEME

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50" css_animation="bottom-to-top" css=".vc_custom_1406108652968{padding-bottom: 4em !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]THE STORY BEHIND BLASZOK

Hello, thanks for taking the time to check out Blaszok. My name is Kuba and I am a web designer & developer form Poland with a small team of talented web geeks. You may know me from my Flash & jQuery Flip Books which were the best selling items around here (before the WordPress boom), and also from WordPress themes likeAgeraorGentle.

Making a truly all-in-one easy to use theme is a goal that has been in my mind for a long time. I have been planning this project for months but the final development took usmore then 3 months of work(sometimes more then 12 hours a day). I am really proud of the final result. We were able to make abeautiful, easy to use & fully customizable theme.As you can see by the previews (home design styles & examples)this theme may be used for almost any website. I hope that you will find as much fun using Blaszok as we had making it. We are fully dedicated to this project and we would love to develop it further but for thatwe need your support.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="2194" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="0em" overlay_color_opacity="7" overlay_pattern_opacity="50" padding="8em 0em 9em 0em" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_features_list" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

LIST OF FEATURES

Check out the awesome features of Blaszok! Have a suggestion? Feel free to contact us.

OVERVIEW

Blaszok is fully responsive & retina ready. Tested on real devices iOS, Android & Windows based. We have made every effort for the Blaszok to look as good (or even better) on mobile devices then it does on desktop. It was designed from the ground up as a responsive theme. We are using font icons to make it look good on any resolution. You have 360+ icons available out of the box, fully responsive & retina ready. For the logo you can specify two sources one for the standard resolution and one for the retina.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 6em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="0" overlay_pattern_opacity="7" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_wpml" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

THEME LAYOUTS

Blaszok lets you choose between three theme main layout styles to give your website a unique look & feel.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2277" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 5em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50" toc_id="toc_backgrounds" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

BACKGROUND SETTINGS

In Theme Options you can choose between three types of backgrounds: color, pattern & image.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2273" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 5em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="7" overlay_pattern_opacity="50" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_header_layouts" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

35 HEADER LAYOUTS

Blaszok has 35 different header layout combinations: 7 for the secondary header and 5 for the main.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2305" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 6em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="0" overlay_pattern_opacity="7" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_skins" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

4 SKINS & UNLIMITED COLOR SETTINGS

With Blaszok you have 4 skins available out of the box with unlimited color settings. With all the layout & visual settings each website is unique.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2312" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][vc_column_text el_class="mpcth-margin-3em"]

EASY SETTINGS

Setting up Blaszok is not a rocket science every setting is easy to change.
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class="mpc-buttons-center"][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_button title="Fashion" target="_blank" custom_color="#b363a0" custom_icon="_none" custom_pos="top" href="http://blaszok.mpcthemes.net/default/?style=0-0-222222-0-B163A3-0-0-0"][vc_button title="Photography" target="_blank" custom_color="#b363a0" custom_icon="_none" custom_pos="top" href="http://blaszok.mpcthemes.net/default/home-2/?style=0-0-ffffff-3-F1C40F-2-3-6"][vc_button title="Restaurant" target="_blank" custom_color="#b363a0" custom_icon="_none" custom_pos="top" href="http://blaszok.mpcthemes.net/default/home-restaurant/?style=0-16-ffffff-2-B59564-5-3-5"][vc_button title="Creative" target="_blank" custom_color="#b363a0" custom_icon="_none" custom_pos="top" href="http://blaszok.mpcthemes.net/default/home-creative/?style=1-26-222222-0-6AC3EF-4-2-2"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image="2313" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 6em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="7" overlay_pattern_opacity="7" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_fonts" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

FONTS & TYPOGRAPHY

Blaszok comes with 600+ fonts available for you to choose from, this theme is em based so when you change the base font size the typography changes accordingly.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2319" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 6em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="0" overlay_pattern_opacity="7" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_sidebars" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

SIDEBARS & FOOTERS

With the awesome ACF meta box plugin bundled with this theme managing sidebars & footers has never been easier.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2321" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 6em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="7" overlay_pattern_opacity="7" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_blog" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

BLOG

Blaszok comes with 2 blog layouts and 9 post formats to let you blog freely.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2374" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 6em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="0" overlay_pattern_opacity="7" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_support" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

5 STAR SUPPORT

We provide as much support as possible to our clients, the tickets are usually resolved within hours!
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2367" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][mpc_vc_quote quote="The customer service is great, every question I had was taken care of seriously and within 24 hours or so. Working good and flawlessly." author="G1975"][mpc_vc_quote quote="In my opinion, an elegant theme. Just what I was looking for. Have a look,it is worth it. Support, is the great value added." author="Masmedialaspalmas"][mpc_vc_quote quote="Awesome theme and awesome support, really!" author="Iddeo"][mpc_vc_quote quote="Great theme and fantastic support! " author="Ralphjhendry"][mpc_vc_quote quote="Excellent Design and Support." author="Joppy11 "][mpc_vc_quote quote="Awesome theme and awesome support. Guaranteed. " author="Popuproyal"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="8em 0em 6em 0em" overlay_color_opacity="7" overlay_pattern_opacity="7" overlay_color="#000000" full_width="1" toc_id="toc_demo" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

DEMO CONTENT

Blaszok comes with full demo content, easy to setup just like the preview.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2376" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="mpcth-margin-5em" alignment="center" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Layer Slider
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]LayerSlider is one of the best sliders on the market right now, thats why we have bundled it with Blaszok. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to add the slider to your pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Slider Example 1"][layerslider_vc id="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="3em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Slider Example 2"][layerslider_vc id="8"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Layer slider comes with it's own vast administration panel where you can set tones of settings, styles effects etc. The possibilities are limitless.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Pricing Tables
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]CSS3 Pricing table is one of the most advanced pricing tables plugins, lets you create any table you like. It comes with over 30 sample pricing tables to get you started. It is shortcode based so you can add it anywhere.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="2em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Example 1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text][css3_grid id='medicenter_blue'][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="2em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Example 2 Sliding Table"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text][css3_grid id='medicenter_green_sliding'][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]CSS3 Pricing Table comes with separate administration panel, it has vast options and to be honest it gives you the ability to achieve any style and any table you like. You can add ribbons, tooltips, animation etc.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.

item.title: I cannot find the documentation?
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded:
1. Download the full package from ThemeForest.
  2. Unzip the package.
  3. Navigate to the documentation folder.
  4. Double Click the Index.html file.

item.title: Load more adds the same posts?
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded: The permalinks structure has to be set to something different then default (this is also a good SEO practice). Login into your wordpress admin panel go to Settings>Permalinks and check something then the default.

item.title: How to make a "Your Page" to display as Home page?
item.dc:creator: mpcreation
item.content:encoded: Go to settings>reading and set static front page as "Your Page".
